title: Mi thianghlimte u enteh u
lyrics:
Mi thianghlimte u, enteh u,
Mi lungngai em ema chu;
Indona hnehin a lo kir,
Mi tin chibai buk tur chu.

Khumtir rawh u, angel-te u,
Lalberte Lalbera chu;
Khumtir rawh u, kan Chhandamtu,
Lalberte Lalber a ni.

Chhandamtu chu khumtir rawh u,
Hnehtu ber Lal Isua kha;
Thiltihtheihna Lalthuthlengah,
Vanah khian a han thu ta.

Mi sualte pawhin an khumtir,
Chhandamtu an cheksawlh kha;
Angel-ten amah an hual vel,
A lalna hming an fak thin.

A lawmna hla ngaithla teh u,
An phaiphuleng ri mawi chu;
Lal Isuan hmun sang ber a chang,
Aw, a va hlimawm dawn em!
